    <metadata>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Molecular structure of ice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Molekulare Struktur des Eises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure moléculaire de glace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura molecular do gelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura molecolare di ghiaccio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοριακή δομή του πάγου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura molecular del hielo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the molecular structure of ice where the regular lattice arrangement leaves a large amount of free space.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">free space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">regular lattice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die molekulare Struktur des 
Eises, in dem die regelmäßige Gitteranordnung eine große Menge 
freien Platz läßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la structure 
moléculaire de la glace où l'agencement régulier de trellis laisse 
une grande quantité de l'espace libre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a estrutura molecular do 
gelo onde o arranjo regular do lattice deixa uma quantidade grande de 
espaço livre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la struttura molecolare
di ghiaccio in cui la disposizione normale della grata lascia una 
grande quantità di spazio libero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μοριακή δομή του πάγου 
όπου η κανονική ρύθμιση δικτυωτού πλέγματος αφήνει ένα μεγάλο 
ποσό ελεύθερου διαστήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la estructura molecular
del hielo donde el arreglo regular del cedazo deja una cantidad grande
de espacio libre.</string>
          </description>
